item.title: How many of these did you know?
item.description: Some quick car tips that every driver should know.

item.title: How I Got Duped Out of My Money
item.description: Hard lesson from a deal gone wrong, explaining how he was misled and what to watch for to avoid the same costly mistake.

item.title: Always get 4 independent evaluations on your trade
item.description: Smart car buyers know the value of comparison, here’s why getting at least four separate evaluations on your trade can save you thousands.

item.title: How These Used Car Issues Can Be Very Costly!
item.description: Common hidden problems in used cars that can turn into expensive repairs, and how to spot them before you buy.

item.title: Joke Sabotage Coincidence
item.description: What starts as a lighthearted moment at the dealership quickly turns into a mix of prank and bad timing, and no one saw it coming.

item.title: I Trolled This Con Artist & He Didn’t Like It
item.description: After spotting a scam, the dealer decides to turn the tables and expose the con artist’s tricks in a clever way he definitely didn’t see coming.

item.title: Why My Wife Is Not Happy With My Auction Purchase
item.description: A car dealer shares the story behind his latest auction purchase, and why it didn’t exactly get the reaction he was hoping for at home.

item.title: 5 Tips For Negotiating With A Car Salesperson
item.description: From timing to preparation, here are five practical negotiation tips to help you get a fair deal on your next vehicle.

item.title: The Truth About a Car’s Extended Warranty!
item.description: Extended warranties can help — or cost you more. Here’s a simple breakdown of what they really cover and when they’re worth it.

item.title: Why Used Car Prices Aren't Dropping Like You Think!
item.description: A clear look at the market forces keeping used car prices higher than expected — and what buyers should know before shopping.

item.title: A Customer Is Trying to Sue Me?!
item.description: An unexpected dispute unfolds as a customer threatens legal action — here’s the story and what led to the misunderstanding.

item.title: 5 Ways Dealers Can Rip You Off With Car Financing
item.description: A clear, simple breakdown of common dealership financing tactics — and how to avoid paying more than you should.

item.title: My Mechanic Got A Surprise!
item.description: A routine visit turns unexpected when our mechanic gets an unusual surprise in the shop — here’s what happened.

item.title: I’d still be closed if the law allowed us to be open.
item.description: Some dealership rules make no sense — here’s a look at the regulations that keep business hours limited, even when demand is high.

item.title: This Is Why You Shouldn’t Buy a Kia
item.description: A closer look at ownership challenges and reliability concerns — here’s what you should know before buying a Kia.

item.title: The Buy Rate Isn’t Your Business
item.description: Just like a chef’s food cost isn’t your concern, neither is a dealership’s buy rate — here’s why understanding value matters more than numbers.

item.title: Why the 2019 Corvette ZR1 Is Hard to Sell
item.description: A stunning car with surprising challenges — here’s why the 2019 Corvette ZR1 isn’t flying off the lot despite its power and appeal.

item.title: Trying To Sell A Kia Sorento At Auction!
item.description: Taking a chance at the auction block! See what happens when we put a Kia Sorento up for bids and find out if it’s a win or a loss.

item.title: The Auction Lied To Me & Gave Me A Rusty Car
item.description: What was promised wasn’t what arrived — here’s the story of how a “clean” auction car turned out to be far from it.

item.title: Introducing our new employee: a 'Fly Guy'!
item.description: A new “employee” has joined the team — and he’s not your average hire. Watch the fun unfold as the crew meets their buzzing coworker!
